txt.en: 'Amon Firn is occupied by a half-orc captain and his gang. They are disturbing the spirits in the area. We must defeat this leader and as many half-orcs as we can.'
Return to Baglan and tell him the captain is defeated
Return to the mission giver and tell him you defeated the half-orc captain.
Mission: The Ruins of Amon Firn
'You have done well [placeholder], as agreed, you are deserving of payment. Take this and know that we are grateful for all you have done.'
'Be careful in the ruins of Amon Firn, [placeholder].'
Search Amon Firn for the half-orc captain and defeat him. Speak with the mission giver when you are ready to travel.
There is no twist in this mission.
Complete the Mission: The Ruins of Amon Firn
Amon Firn is occupied by half-orcs. Their leader must be somewhere amongst the ruins. Defeat him!
